name: ZOMBIE HUNTER -CRIMSON HANBOK
description:
Zombies that fell asleep deep in the ground have been awakened by a curse.
The main character who is trapped in the midst of the curse endlessly hunts zombies.
The battle never ends... So how long can you endure...?

> Jeonju Hanok Village, an actual tourist attraction in S. Korea, is implemented in the game as a digital twin.
> This is a zombie shooting game.
> Use a variety of firearms to hunt zombies and clear missions.
> Collect gold and use them to strengthen your weapons and collect souls to upgrade your abilities.
